QuestData.Title: Trouble Has Huge Feet
QuestData.Description:
The Ettin's hide bears many shallow scratch marks and bite scars. It seems he had been terrorizing the local Owlcats for quite some time.
Mardranel Forestheart would be interested in this.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Grotesque Ettin Leather to Mardranel Forestheart.
